title.rendered: 2016 Brand Nieuwe Conference: Online Registration Closes This Friday

content.rendered:
Online registration for the 2016 Brand Nieuwe Conference in Amsterdam will close THIS Friday, June 10. This applies to both in-person tickets AND webcast registrations. There will be no exceptions. After June 11, in-person tickets will be available at the door on June 20 for €600 + VAT; webcast registrations will NOT be available after June 11.

For people considering the webcast: Remember that we provide individual video files of all presentations for download a few days after the event so if you miss some or the time difference is too wild, you will get to see all presentations eventually.
